title: When should you use context API?
content: The Context API is useful in situations where passing state through multiple layers of components becomes difficult and results in 'prop drilling'.

title: What is a custom hook?
content: . A custom hook is a reusable function that contains logic which can be shared between components.

title: What is useRef?
content: useRef is a hook in React that allows you to create a mutable ref object that persists across component renders.

title: What is useMemo?
content: useMemo is a hook in React that allows you to memoize a function's return value.
